snippet: The Long Island Power Authority said power was available to all but a few customers on the Rockaway Peninsula, but damage to homes and buildings was still too severe to safely return power to most customers.
abstract: New York City continues its recovery after Hurricane Sandy, with fuel shortages easing and the Queens-Midtown Tunnel fully open again; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: The Long Island Power Authority said power was available to all but a few customers on the Rockaway Peninsula, but damage to homes and buildings was still too severe to safely return power to most customers.

headline.seo: Updates to Services in New York City After Hurricane Sandy
